displayName.italian: Sta diventando il momento, non è vero?

description.english: Said goodbye to Mom.
description.french: Dites au revoir à maman.
description.german: Habe mich von Mama verabschiedet.
description.italian: Hai detto addio alla mamma.
description.latam: Le dijiste adiós a mamá.
description.schinese: 和妈妈说再见了。

description.english: Got busted by Mom at the library!
description.french: Vous vous êtes fait pincer par maman dans la bibliothèque.
description.german: Wurde von Mama in der Bibliothek erwischt!
description.italian: Sono stato beccato dalla mamma in biblioteca!
description.latam: ¡Mamá te descubrió en la biblioteca!
description.schinese: 在图书馆被妈妈抓到了！

description.english: Made the best burgers in town.
description.french: Fais les meilleurs burgers de toute la ville.
description.german: Habe die besten Burger der Stadt gemacht.
description.italian: Hai preparato gli hamburger più buoni della città.
description.latam: Hiciste las mejores hamburguesas de la ciudad.
description.schinese: 做出了城里最好的汉堡。

description.english: Put all the books back in their rightful place.
description.french: Retournez tous les livres à leur place.
description.german: Legen Sie alle Bücher zurück an ihren rechtmäßigen Platz.
description.italian: Rimetti tutti i libri al loro posto.
description.latam: Devuelva todos los libros a su lugar correspondiente.
description.schinese: 将所有的书放回原处。
description.turkish: Bütün kitapları hak ettikleri yere koyun.

displayName.english: Not bad for an old man
displayName.french: Pas mal pour un vieil homme
displayName.german: Nicht schlecht für einen alten Mann
displayName.latam: No está mal para un anciano
displayName.schinese: 对于一个老人来说还不错
displayName.turkish: Yaşlı bir adam için fena değil

description.english: Beat Sophie at Hide and Seek!
description.french: Battu Sophie à une partie de cache-cache.
description.german: Besiege Sophie beim Versteckspiel!
description.italian: Batti Sophie a nascondino!
description.latam: ¡Vence a Sophie en el juego del escondite!
description.schinese: 在捉迷藏中打败索菲！

description.english: Reached the end of Bernard's journey.
description.french: Vous avez atteint la fin du voyage de Bernard.
description.german: Das Ende von Bernards Reise erreicht.
description.italian: Giunto alla fine del viaggio di Bernard.
description.latam: Has llegado al final del viaje de Bernard.
description.schinese: 到达伯纳德旅程的终点​​。

description.english: Helped Bernard catch his first fish with dad.
description.french: Vous avez aidé Bernard à attraper son premier poisson avec son père.
description.german: Habe Bernard geholfen, mit Papa seinen ersten Fisch zu fangen.
description.italian: Hai aiutato Bernard a catturare il suo primo pesce con papà.
description.latam: Ayudaste a Bernard a pescar su primer pez con papá.
description.schinese: 帮助伯纳德和爸爸一起钓到他的第一条鱼。
description.turkish: Bernard'ın babasıyla birlikte ilk balığını yakalamasına yardım ettim.

description.english: Said goodbye to dad.
description.french: Dites au revoir à papa.
description.german: Habe mich von Papa verabschiedet.
description.italian: Hai detto addio a papà.
description.latam: Le dijiste adiós a papá.
description.schinese: 和爸爸说再见了。

description.english: Played C&C with Bernard and his friends for the first time.
description.french: Vous avez joué à C&C avec Bernard et ses amis pour la première fois.
description.german: Habe zum ersten Mal C&C mit Bernard und seinen Freunden gespielt.
description.italian: Hai giocato per la prima volta a C&C con Bernard e i suoi amici.
description.latam: Jugaste C&C con Bernard y sus amigos por primera vez.
description.schinese: 第一次和伯纳德和他的朋友们一起玩 《城堡与生物》。
description.turkish: Bernard ve arkadaşlarıyla ilk defa C&C oynadık.

description.english: Completed the first of many letters.
description.french: Compléter la première de plusieurs lettres.
description.german: Den ersten von vielen Briefen fertiggestellt.
description.italian: You have completed the first of many letters.
description.latam: Completaste la primera de muchas letras.
description.schinese: 完成了很多封信中的第一封。

displayName.english: She Told Me This Was Enough...
displayName.french: Elle m'a dit que c'était suffisant...
displayName.german: Sie sagte mir, das sei genug ...
displayName.italian: Mi ha detto che era abbastanza...
displayName.latam: Ella me dijo que esto era suficiente...

description.english: Helped Bernard to be there for Emily.
description.french: Vous avez aidé Bernard à être présent pour Emily.
description.german: Hat Bernard geholfen, für Emily da zu sein.
description.italian: Hai aiutato Bernard a essere lì per Emily.
description.latam: Ayudaste a Bernard a estar ahí para Emily.
description.schinese: 帮助伯纳德陪伴艾米丽。
description.turkish: Bernard'ın Emily'nin yanında olmasına yardım ettim.

description.english: Met Bernard's four-legged best friend.
description.french: Rencontrer la meilleure amie à quatre pattes de Bernard.
description.german: Habe Bernards vierbeinigen besten Freund kennengelernt.
description.italian: Hai incontrato il migliore amico a quattro zampe di Bernard.
description.latam: Conociste al mejor amigo de cuatro patas de Bernard.
description.schinese: 见到了伯纳德的四条腿最好的朋友。
description.turkish: Bernard'ın dört ayaklı en iyi arkadaşıyla tanıştım.

description.english: Found a secret at the cabin.
description.french: Trouver un secret au chalet.
description.german: In der Hütte ein Geheimnis gefunden.
description.italian: Hai scoperto un segreto nella baita.
description.latam: Encontraste un secreto en la cabaña.
description.schinese: 在小屋里发现了一个秘密。

displayName.german: Du hältst dich für so schlau.

description.english: Beat the math problem!
description.french: Résolu le problème de math!
description.german: Lösen Sie das Matheproblem!
description.italian: Risolvi il problema di matematica!
description.latam: ¡Resolviste el problema de matemáticas!
description.schinese: 解决了数学问题！

description.english: Created chaos and made a mess.
description.french: Vous avez causé du chaos et fait des dégâts.
description.german: Hat Chaos gestiftet und ein Durcheinander angerichtet.
description.italian: Ha creato caos e confusione.
description.latam: Creaste caos y causaste un desastre.
description.schinese: 制造混乱，一片狼藉。

description.english: Escaped Sophie's wrath.
description.french: Échapper au courroux de Sophie.
description.german: Sophies Zorn entkommen.
description.italian: Sfuggito all'ira di Sophie.
description.latam: Escapaste de la ira de Sophie.
description.schinese: 逃脱了索菲的愤怒。

description.english: Defeated Elfie in C&C!
description.french: Vaincu Elfie durant la partie de C&C.
description.german: Elfie in C&C besiegt!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Elfie in C&C!
description.latam: ¡Derrotaste a Elfie en C&C!
description.schinese: 在《城堡与生物》中击败 飞飞！

description.english: Pet the best dog in the world, Elfie!
description.french: Flatter le meilleur chien au monde, Elfie!
description.german: Streicheln Sie den besten Hund der Welt, Elfie!
description.italian: Accarezza il cane migliore del mondo, Elfie!
description.latam: ¡Acaricia al mejor perro del mundo, Elfie!
description.schinese: 抚摸世界上最好的狗狗，飞飞！
description.turkish: Dünyanın en iyi köpeği Elfie'yi sevin!

description.english: Experienced every fishing memory with Bernard.
description.french: Revivre chaque souvenir pêché avec Bernard.
description.german: Erleben Sie jede mit Bernard gefischte Erinnerung noch einmal.
description.italian: Ho rivissuto ogni ricordo di pesca con Bernard.
description.latam: Experimentaste cada recuerdo de pesca con Bernard.
description.schinese: 与伯纳德一起经历每一次钓鱼的记忆。
description.turkish: Bernard ile her balık tutma anısını yaşadım.

description.english: Collected all the figurines.
description.french: Récupérer toutes les figurines.
description.german: Alle Figuren gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai collezionato tutte le statuette.
description.latam: Has recogido todas las figuras.
description.schinese: 收集完所有小雕像。

description.english: Collected all the postcards.
description.french: Récupérer toutes les cartes postales.
description.german: Alle Postkarten gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai collezionato tutte le cartoline.
description.latam: Recogiste todas las postales.
description.schinese: 收集了所有明信片。

description.english: Acquired all postcards and figurines.
description.french: Retrouver toutes les figurines et les cartes postales.
description.german: Alle Postkarten und Figuren entdeckt.
description.italian: Hai acquisito tutte le cartoline e le statuette.
description.latam: Has adquirido todas las postales y figuras.
description.schinese: 获得了所有明信片和小雕像。

displayName.italian: Una volta che hai incontrato qualcuno...
displayName.latam: Una vez que conoces a alguien...

description.english: Helped Bernard remember every character.
description.french: Vous avez aidé Bernard à se souvenir de chaque personnage.
description.german: Hat Bernard geholfen, sich an alle Charaktere zu erinnern.
description.italian: Hai aiutato Bernard a ricordare ogni personaggio.
description.latam: Ayudaste a Bernard a recordar cada carácter.
description.schinese: 帮助伯纳德记住每一个角色。
description.turkish: Bernard'ın her karakteri hatırlamasına yardım ettim.

description.english: Forget every character.
description.french: Oubliez tous les personnages.
description.german: Vergiss jedes Zeichen.
description.italian: Dimentica ogni carattere.
description.latam: Olvídate de cada personaje.
description.schinese: 忘记每一个角色。

description.english: Opened every door along the staircase.
description.french: Vous avez ouvert toutes les portes de l'escalier.
description.german: Öffnete alle Türen entlang der Treppe.
description.italian: Hai aperto tutte le porte lungo le scale.
description.latam: Abriste todas las puertas a lo largo de la escalera.
description.schinese: 打开楼梯上的每一扇门。
description.turkish: Merdiven boyunca uzanan tüm kapıları açtım.

description.english: Experienced every micro-memory with Bernard.
description.french: Revivez tous les micros-souvenirs avec Bernard.
description.german: Habe jede Mikroerinnerung mit Bernard erlebt.
description.italian: Hai vissuto ogni micro-ricordo con Bernard.
description.latam: Experimentaste cada micro-recuerdo con Bernard.
description.schinese: 和伯纳德一起经历每一个微记忆。
description.turkish: Bernard ile her mikro anıyı yaşadım.

description.english: Learnt mom's favourite flowers.
description.french: Apprit la fleur préférée de maman.
description.german: Habe Mamas Lieblingsblumen gelernt.
description.italian: Ho scoperto i fiori preferiti della mamma.
description.latam: Aprendiste cuáles son las flores favoritas de mamá.
description.schinese: 了解了妈妈最喜欢的花。

displayName.english: Toughest Crew In All The Realms
displayName.french: La troupe la plus forte des royaumes
displayName.italian: La squadra più dura di tutti i regni
displayName.latam: La tripulación más dura de todos los reinos

description.english: Beat all C&C creatures with Bernard and his crew!
description.french: Vaincre toutes les créatures de C&C avec Bernard et sa troupe.
description.german: Besiege alle C&C-Kreaturen mit Bernard und seiner Crew!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto tutte le creature di C&C con Bernard e il suo equipaggio!
description.latam: ¡Derrota a todas las criaturas de C&C con Bernard y su tripulación!
description.schinese: 与伯纳德和他的队员一起击败所有 《城堡与生物》敌人！
description.turkish: Bernard ve ekibiyle tüm C&C yaratıklarını yen!

description.english: Became an expert kite flyer.
description.french: Devenu un expert du cerf-volant.
description.german: Wurde ein erfahrener Drachenflieger.
description.italian: Sei diventato un esperto pilota di aquiloni.
description.latam: Te convertiste en un experto volador de cometas.
description.schinese: 成为一名风筝放飞专家。

description.english: Filled every page of Bernard's journal!
description.french: Toutes les pages du journal de Bernard ont été remplies.
description.german: Jede Seite von Bernards Tagebuch gefüllt!
description.italian: Hai riempito ogni pagina del diario di Bernard!
description.latam: ¡Llenaste cada página del diario de Bernard!
description.schinese: 填满了伯纳德日记的每一页！

description.english: Discovered the Googly-Eyed Rock!
description.french: Découvert la roche avec des yeux remuants.
description.german: Den Googly-Eyed Rock entdeckt!
description.italian: Hai scoperto la roccia con gli occhi googly
description.latam: ¡Descubriste la roca de los ojos saltones!
description.schinese: 发现了长着大眼睛的岩石！

description.english: Realized you're too old for running.
description.french: Vous avez réalisé que vous étiez trop vieux pour courir.
description.german: Sie haben erkannt, dass Sie zum Laufen zu alt sind.
description.italian: Ti sei reso conto che sei troppo vecchio per correre.
description.latam: Te diste cuenta de que eres demasiado viejo para correr.
description.schinese: 你意识到自己太老了，不适合跑步。
description.turkish: Koşmak için artık çok yaşlı olduğunu fark ettin.

displayName.german: Man kann nie genug Hüte haben!
displayName.italian: Non ci sono mai abbastanza cappelli!

description.english: Tried on every hat!
description.french: Vous avez essayé tous les chapeaux.
description.german: Jeden Hut anprobiert!
description.italian: Hai provato tutti i cappelli!
description.latam: ¡Te probaste todos los sombreros!
description.schinese: 试戴每一顶帽子！
